version_description:
- Added support for ebook AZW 3 format and html OPUS audio format
- Fixed a lot of bugs

Improved:
- We rewrote the upload engine so uploads will be processed faster and with less errors!
- Share with built-in web, FTP, WebDAV server
- Upload to a WebDAV server
- Upload to your Dropbox account
- Upload to a FTP server
- Upload using the HTTP POST method (for example to upload to your own server where a PHP script saves the file)

- Complete redesign!
- Faster, Lighter and more secure!
- Added more conversions
- More optional settings
